message: I just tried to install django-registration in my requirements.txt file but the epio server gave me an error. I'm pretty sure it's installed it before....

ep.io: Bundling error!
django-registration failed to install. Please check your requirements.txt file before retrying.
@dsr Looks like you have a "\r" line ending, which shouldn't happen - fix the requirements file to use "\n" or "\r\n", and you should be fine
Oh. Crap. Yeah. I didn't notice that. Thanks.
